pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:5.1: 31. The training rule on lying down on the same bed
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:6.2: At that time two nuns were lying down on the same bed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:6.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:6.4: “How can two nuns lie down on the same bed? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.4: “How can two nuns lie down on the same bed?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.8: How can two nuns lie down on the same bed?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:8.1: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same bed, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:9.4: fully ordained is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:10.1: If two […] lie down on the same bed:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:10.2: if, when one is lying down, the other lies down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:10.3: If both lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:10.4: Every time they get up and then lie down again, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:11.2: if they are the first offenders.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:12.1: The first training rule is finished.
